All FSI brands are sold throughout North America via a large network of appliance and equipment resellers. Our headquarters are located in Bronx, NY, with additional manufacturing, fabrication, customer service, and distribution facilities in Edison, NJ, and Wallingford, CT. Felix Storch, Inc.

(FSI), was founded in 1969 as a manufacturer and distributor of specialty major appliances. Through its Summit Appliance division, it now specializes in residential refrigeration, cooking, and laundry products, with a strong focus in built-in undercounter and ADA compliant appliances.

May 13, 2024 - FSI is organized as a single integrated operating company with a consolidated staff and marketing organized by markets served. Our primary brands are divided into two distinct markets: Refrigeration for healthcare, life-science, laboratory, vaccine, and pharmacy use.

December 13, 2023 - Summit Appliance is the residential product division of Felix Storch, Inc (FSI).
